website_summaries.verdict: The Epson PowerLite 3020 projector series offers up a decent deal with a sophisticated picture and a couple of unique features.
pros: The  Epson PowerLite 3020 offers up decent amounts of shadow detail and black level for a budget-minded projector
It's easy to use and offers a lot of tweaking capabilities
3D and 24P playback are miles ahead of what a TV at the same price can offer
cons: WirelessHD (3020e only) is an expensive upgrade and needs clear line of sight to work
colors are a little off compared to the cheaper BenQ W107
black levels come at the expense of a noisy iris motor

customer_reviews.title: The difference is so spectacularly better that I am still in awe and jokingly state ...
customer_reviews.text: This projector replaced a 480 line business projector that is approximately 15 years old. The difference is so spectacularly better that I am still in awe and jokingly state that you need sunglasses to watch the bright and high contrast picture. I view my shows on an 80 inch wide screen that lowers in front of my fireplace and allows the ambiance of a fire below and great movies in high def above. A Sony 7.1 amp with video switching rounds out my home theatre experience.
customer_reviews.author: Shelton R. Shivers

customer_reviews.title: great Long throw projector option
customer_reviews.text: This projector has been a great purchase. We needed an option for displaying our tv over the fire place without having to run power and a mount on the brick. Found this projector on Amazon for the cheapest price and have not been disappointed. The 3D is cool but honestly rarely ever use it. It is a great long throw projector. We are using it almost at its smallest setting 100" at about 16 feet and it displays a great picture, even during daylight hours.
customer_reviews.author: Frugel Shopper

customer_reviews.title: We've only been using it for a few weeks but it offers a quality picture and its easy to manage
customer_reviews.text: We recently remodeled a room in our home to become a theater room and needed a projector. I did a lot of research, checked reviews, and asked opinions from virtually everyone who might have information - and, ultimately, chose this projector. We've only been using it for a few weeks but it offers a quality picture and its easy to manage. What more could you want? Oh....I know....a good price! Well, I picked a refurbished option (a little hesitant but I knew I could return it if it didn't work) and saved about 25%.
customer_reviews.author: CharlotteChick

customer_reviews.title: Died just after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even rack up 500 hours on this projector and it died just after the 2 year mark. It started by flashing the red temp light and now it shuts off about 30 seconds. Both power and temp light being solid red and the projector is unusable. Called Epson support and they said to ship it to Dallas to get it repaired, which will probably cost more than another projector. AV forums indicate that this projector is known for being bad. Lesson learned and I won't be buying another Epson projector.
customer_reviews.author: Greg B.

customer_reviews.title: The picture is far better than the original 3010
customer_reviews.text: The picture is far better than the original 3010, which I had for 5-ish years and finally died. The 3020 has much deeper blacks, better 3D controls and picture, and the overall picture quality seems far superior to the old 3010. In my opinion, this is the best projector on the market for the money. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: thatoneguy

customer_reviews.title: A Great Quality Replacement without breaking the Bank.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Projector. Got it Refurbished to save money and love it. Used to own an Optoma HD33 and this really beats it in every way. Deep Blacks, saturated colors and Image Brightness superb. Painted my Retractable 125" White Screen with Silver Pearl Paint Mix and blacks are as deep as my Regular 55" LG TV which I love and have had for many Years.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Hesman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome with ambient light
customer_reviews.text: After a great deal of research, we opted to purchase this projector as it has a setting specific for a room with ambient light. Though we are both movie lovers, we also love to play Wii and watch sports on the big screen with friends. Forcing us to have a blackout entertainment room with guests over seemed a bit dreary. This projector has been absolutely what we needed to have a multifunctional entertainment space and we get lots of comments on how great the picture looks without closing the blinds in our window-filled entertainment room.
customer_reviews.author: Edub007Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing-balls!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I am very impressed how well it works in dim light. Of course, it sucks outside during the day time, but it works great in a lit room. I enjoy using it for basic television and movies, since when watching tv, you generally don't want to be in pitch blackness. This guy satisfies all my viewing needs. I would recommend mounting it on the dead center, since the keystone features aren't perfect, but I've never seen a protector that can do angled shots well anyways.
customer_reviews.author: zSprawl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I went from a Infocus Screenplay 5000 to this and I can't be more happy with it. The old projector was 720p and when my basement flooded I had to temporarily suspend movie watching while having it restored. During that time I was watching my living room 1080p TV and when I went back to the basement theater I realized the difference was more than I thought. So I bought this projector and it's amazing. Bright Colors, good black quality and all around much better then my old one. The 3D is amazing as well.
customer_reviews.author: buffalodan

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Best
customer_reviews.text: Projector looks like new, no visual defects. I'm very satisfied with the fast shipping and even more with the performance of the Epson 3020 projector. My first projector was a Kloss Novabeam back in the 80s, since then I've had projectors from Sharp, Panasonic, Optima, Acer & Epson. This 3020 blows them all away, buy one, the price refurbished is a steal, and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K. J. Searcy

customer_reviews.title: good unit, bad Epson customer service
customer_reviews.text: The PowerLite 3020 is a fantastic projector. My family really enjoys the 3D, it is not what we had anticipated. The 3D really gives the image depth instead of coming out at your face. Quite enjoyable. I would have given this 5 stars if It was not for the fiasco to begin with. I had to return my first one to Epson after it did not emit an image. Epson placed the value of another unit on hold on my credit card and sent me a new unit 3 days later. I was disappointed in the customer service, they acted as if I was a burden asking for them to fix the situation with my faulty unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Comyns

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: Because this was refurbished, we went through 3 units (3rd time is the charm). Epson support was spot on and sent out the replacement units with no issues. The unit is much better than my Hitachi 50 inch unit, now we have a 96" led tv to watch with 3-D! My daughter loves the projector!
customer_reviews.author: Aum

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. It blows my friends minds too
customer_reviews.text: Use this to play 3d games. Amazing. It blows my friends minds too. Great for 3d movies too. Just be careful with the glasses, they are very fragile. Broke 2 already from sitting on them
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Very good projector for given price and features
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for two months now and very pleased with it. Stunning colors and very ideal for a budget home theater given its price. Amazon Prime service was awesome, the projector arrived intact and undamaged on the second day of ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Subbarao V.

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: Finally open the box and tried to turn it on the temp light and lamp light is blinking red and the projector isn’t showing anything.
customer_reviews.author: Adlin Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Great projector,  best value on the internet,  does everything, 3d and more. great price and excellent performance.
customer_reviews.text: Great projector, works great and best price on the internet. Great value does everything I wanted and more. . Wise choice for a great projector.
customer_reviews.author: GRAHAM HAZLETTE

customer_reviews.title: Great projector with very high resolution
customer_reviews.text: Great projector with very high resolution. My 70" screen is too small so I used a white stretched sheet on the wall. Not the best way to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Kitajima

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for someone else and is much larger than I first thought, but the picture quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: jaguerrero

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as 3D in the theaters
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this projector from the Powerlite Home Cinema 8500 UB just so I could get into viewing 3D media and I am completely thrilled with this projector. Just as good as 3D in the theaters. It even came with two 3D active glasses. Received the projector in just 2 days with Amazon Prime free shipping. My only ULTRA-MINOR issue is that I wish they would have included protective pouches for the glasses.
customer_reviews.author: MikeMarks

customer_reviews.title: 3D done right.
customer_reviews.text: Incredile color and detail....great 3d depth. Would be 5 stars if it was smaller and had a shorter throw radius.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: This is my first rodeo with projectors and I have loved it. The 3D is fantastic, the overall 2D picture is amazing. Not having the Lens shift was not as big a factor as I thought it would be. I had no issue getting a perfect picture on my screen. Looks great and has worked fantastic up to this point in moderate light to pitch dark. Impressive either way.
customer_reviews.author: Hooch

customer_reviews.title: Opening Day with my new Epson 3020
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Do not buy this from any other store! Amazon does it again by using top sellers on their site. The service was great using Prime. The Price was fantasic and the Epson 3020 is the star. Right out of the box and connecting it to the Direct TV to watch the opening baseball game of the year (using the HDMI) Mets vs.Nats I felt I was there. Great buy so far a 10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great clarity love it
customer_reviews.text: we just had this hooked up and watched the hobit in bluray, wow, the clarity was excellent, love using this projector
customer_reviews.author: Debi W.

customer_reviews.title: 3020 is the best
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Epson 3020 projector and I can tell you they are awesome, am even thinking about buying a third one. No regrets at all.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as the Pro (and less expensive) other than the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a damaged PowerLite Pro in my home theatre. Almost as good as the Pro (and less expensive) other than the handling of night scenes/dark spaces is not as good. Handled all of my RS232 commands without any reprogramming and fit my existing mount - so all good.
customer_reviews.author: Off The Grid

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding 3D Projection System
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many Home Theater systems thru out the years. This is the best projector system I have owned to date. One of the reasons I purchased this particular unit was its 2D to 3D conversion abilities. It can make any 2D picture a 3D one, including commercials.<LOL>. The picture quality and color is superior. It has many other features that make this projector a great buy. Unlike many of the units I have owned, this system produces a high quality picture even in well a lit room.
customer_reviews.author: Tim McGee

customer_reviews.title: Good for home theater
customer_reviews.text: One thing to note: make sure you check the mount stand hole spacing and compare it to the Epson's. My universal mount fell short and I had to make a few workarounds. Other than that, I'd highly recommend it. The contrast is very good with about 16.5' throw and .9 gain screen (projector in eco mode)
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Works well, delivers the image
customer_reviews.text: Th projector works as advertised. I am a low-level user, not interested in 3-d, so I can't comment on that. I paid for this projector to get the contrast ratio, which looks good in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: StuieP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Big wide picture
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Big wide picture. Shows clear quality on any wall even if you project just on a regular wall. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Instant Karma__

customer_reviews.title: Clear and bright
customer_reviews.text: This projector is excellent. The images are clear and bright. It does HD as well as regular TV. It has two HDMI ports. Mainly though its the clarity of the projection that leads to my review.
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: A must for a home theater room.
customer_reviews.text: Great option for the media room clarity 10, options 10, ease of set up and look absolutely a 10.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: not function
customer_reviews.text: The projector is fine but the keystone function is not working at all. I have tried for at least several hours to aline the image but no luck. frustrated and decided to return the projector. Even the project got pretty good picture.
customer_reviews.author: Tinh T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector and Great Picture
customer_reviews.text: Great Projector and Great Picture!!! Bought this first to test out what the screen size would look like in the room and then bought a screen a couple weeks later. Great projector! Allows you a lot of control shifting the picture. Using it in a 13x13 room with a picture of 106"
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy A.

customer_reviews.title: Great projector, highly rated and worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit based upon recommendation from a projector review site. It is bright and the picture is fantastic. With my old projector, we could not watch it during the day due to the high light levels in the room. Now, that is not a problem. I am currently projecting on a wall with a screen painted on it with normal interior house paint. It works very well. I didn't care about the 3D part, but that works great as well. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: My wife was concerned when I said I wanted a 120-inch screen for the man cave. She has since said it was a great decision. The picture is amazing, especially on blu-ray. I love watching the NHL playoffs on it. It was perfect. The action in the corners was awesome. The 3D is also amazing. We were watching a 3D IMAX special on NASCAR. One of the tires came off of a car and came right at the screen. We all jumped to get out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing projector
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this projector it looks better than my Samsung 3D TV and the 3D looks better too and it looks better than the 3D you get at the movies this is an amazing projector
customer_reviews.author: Alex bravo

customer_reviews.title: Absolute amazing picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolute amazing picture quality. I found a couple DYI screen how to's after a quick google, and it looks as good as in the theater even when the lights are behind the projector.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: amazing picture quality...we use it with a 110" elite screen at 11 foot distance. there is a 3D feature which we havent used much as 3D DVDs are hard to rent but we tried out 3D and it is good!!
customer_reviews.author: tanvi

customer_reviews.title: Great projector on a budget!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't beat it. I have it hung 18 feet from my wall and on the largest screen thrown makes a great 15 ft pic. Friends are amazed at how clear the picture is. Now I have it in a very dark room so the brightness wasn't a factor for me. A room with windows during the day would be a bit dimmer picture. Perfect for the man cave in the basement! Don't rely on the speakers. Must purchase separate audio system without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: display and audio are good, but my living room is too small so i have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: redemption2017

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Researched for a year on and off and I made the right choice. considered buying the optoma hd20 that a friend had which was half the price. for the extra money and featues this is a must if you can afford it.
customer_reviews.author: Wizardou812

customer_reviews.title: ... said it was okay but the 5030 was WAY better. I think this project is super good
customer_reviews.text: I was very apprehensive about purchasing this projector because most of the reviews said it was okay but the 5030 was WAY better. I think this project is super good! Yes the iris is a little noisy, and the fan does hum, but when you are watching a movie you can hardly tell! For anyone that wants a GREAT projector at a good price...get this one!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: First projector and so far I am loving it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector for my media room. I was scared to put it first time but as I wasnt sure what all setting I will have to do. But it was a piece of cake. Arrived on time. (less than a week old) Worked in one go To my surprise the screen size (picture size) is bigger than what I was expecting, so very happy about it. Watched few movies and loving the picture quality I havent tried 3D movies on it yet, need to get a 3D DVD and watch to see how good it is. I will provide feedback once I get a chance to check that.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent overall product just tested it out and the image ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast Service! Excellent overall product just tested it out and the image is very bright and defined.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to anyone looking for a home projector. The price to quality ratio is fantastic. When projected on a proper screen, it has really impressed me, my family, and anyone else that comes over.
customer_reviews.author: Asim Ranginwala

customer_reviews.title: Epson 3020
customer_reviews.text: Super bright sharp picture and very good color. Its like watching a top of the line lcd television only 5 times larger. If your use to DLP projection it does't have that color pop almost 3d effect they have. Ive had both i liked dlp alot but i could see the rainbow and i was afraid it might get worse so i returned it. Others have said you cant adjust the horizontal but all you have to do is angle it toward the screen if it isnt exactly centered. Overall its a great projector i really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cranium

customer_reviews.title: Movie Theater
customer_reviews.text: This is by far and away one of the best entertainment experiences that money can buy. The color is excellent, the 3D is an outstanding feature that you can use when you wish. Dollar for dollar this is a great value and addition for any home. People are blown away when they come over to watch.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: HDMI port stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, the HDMI port stopped working on this item just over a year after purchase. Contacted Epson Support and they said they would not honor the warranty because the seller is not an authorized agent.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hollins

customer_reviews.title: This us a great projector but DON'T BUY IT FROM NUE DESIGN CASES ...
customer_reviews.text: This us a great projector but DON'T BUY IT FROM NUE DESIGN CASES as there customer service is the worst I've ever seen
customer_reviews.author: robert goodall

customer_reviews.title: Great projector for home theater project
customer_reviews.text: This is my first projector to own. I've been using it for several weeks now and the performance has been great. I've used it for movies, watching football, and playing xBox. I've gotten lots of compliments on the picture quality. For the price I am realy pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon L.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and ease to set up.
customer_reviews.text: This equipment works just fine, it is ease to set up and adjust to what ever you use as a screen. Brightness is fine, the noise of the auto iris is just so low that you hardly notice it. The 2D to 3D conversion works just fine, of couse not as good as a 3D native movie but it certainly makes any 2D movie more interested. The sound of the speaker is fine too. It works fine with other active RF Glasses as the cheaper ValueView.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Antonio Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed pretty much watching movies
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed pretty much watching movies. The only problem I have there's a red shadowing on right side of the screen, from top to bottom approximately about 5 inches wide, Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: e c

customer_reviews.title: I have it in the rec room and use it towatch tv. (no gaming
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one of those guys who knows a lot about projectors. I have it in the rec room and use it to watch tv. (no gaming, etc..) All I can say is.. the picture is awesome! Love it. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent... Easy to install and fits my Epson 3020 perfect..
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: I really love the Epson Home Cinema 3020 projector
customer_reviews.text: I really love the Epson Home Cinema 3020 projector. The picture is very clear and crisp. It was easy to set up and get up and running. I do have some experience with projectors and that may have something to do with it. I have had Optoma HD70, HD20 and HD23. They were all good but each had mechanical issues. The Epson blows them all out of the water in terms of performance and bells and whistles. No rainbow effect like the DLP technology. I am still learning the features including the 3 D functions. I may post more as I get to know the projector. So far, all systems go! Great product and good price point.
customer_reviews.author: Cyberdebo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as expected and hoped. Easy to hook up and very user friendly adjustments. Incredible picture quality, but does work better in a darker room.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Wyss

customer_reviews.title: my 2nd Epson projector has HDMI issues... ...
customer_reviews.text: my 2nd Epson projector has HDMI issues...no signal from HDMI input...I am going to have to call Epson for return or repair...
customer_reviews.author: Kamlesh

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a seven year old $7k Sim 2 with this projector. It's quieter and has many more features. It was easy to setup and is a great addition to my dedicated theater.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F

customer_reviews.title: excellent projector
customer_reviews.text: This is my first projector amazed with picture quality. I am projecting on smooth white wall with flat paint on it, really amazing. Tried 2D to 3D conversion and looks good. The 3D glasses are light weight and very convenient. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ravindra

customer_reviews.title: Epson Rocks!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing picture, and great price! At first set up, without any adjustments aside from focus and zoom it was an awesome and near flawless picture. Playing PS3 is out of this world. Avatar in 3D was breath taking! The only drawback is that it only comes with two pairs of 3D glasses and the Epson ones cost a small fortune. If it came with 4 pairs it would have been an awesome package. Great quality at an affordable price. Epson rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Flores

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. The resolution of the image is very good. I think the final image improves a lot if you add curtains that bloock the light of the windows on the room that you set the projector.
customer_reviews.author: JUAN GOMEZ

customer_reviews.title: ... projector first one would not play 3d was very happy.
customer_reviews.text: once I got my second projector first one would not play 3d was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We are not disappointed.  The 3D is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: With barely any noticeable crosstalk, the bright 3D from this projector is amazing! The Samsung SSG-4100GB 3D glasses for about 20 bucks works great with this projector. This projector also does a great job at smoothing out fast moving 1080i.
customer_reviews.author: O from Reno

customer_reviews.title: Very good bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: I got the Epson 3020 projector to replace an aging infocus projector I had. After a week or so of use, I love this projector. It is installed in a basement where light can be controlled, however its brightness is more than effective with the lights turned on as it is with the lights turned off. It is not noisy at all when compared with my previous projector and the black levels are to my liking. This projector meets my needs without destroying my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hicks

customer_reviews.title: very good, i love it!!
customer_reviews.text: super awesome projector im happy i bought it. ****update: I just accidently knocked mine over ( from about 5ft off the ground and had some "cushions" impeding its fall ), and It still works, very thankfully. I had to unplug and replug the hdmi cable though because it went staticy and then green screen. but it works fine after that. sigh....
customer_reviews.author: SAMFISHER

customer_reviews.title: epson projector
customer_reviews.text: picture is very good, am very happy with my purchase. I wish an instruction manual came with it, that would make things easier.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Greaving

customer_reviews.title: Very good home cinema projector
customer_reviews.text: It the first home cinema projector i owne . It was a very nice experience to watch movies at home.
customer_reviews.author: Fouad AlMarzouki

customer_reviews.title: Epson Powerlite 3020 Home Theater Projector
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced my InFocus projector with the Epson 3020 Ho,e Theater Projector. The install was easy enough in my home theater. The projector is very good. The picture quality is outstanding. The projector is very quite when running. I am very pleased with the performance and look forward to the college football season on my 110 inch screen. It is a great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Johnson

customer_reviews.title: True home theater projector
customer_reviews.text: This is the best of the best home theater projector. This unit will bring you the whole theater to your home. Stop reading comments and just go buy it, you won't regret. The picture quality is much better then my tv and 3d is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: a great picture for the price... If you are not too bothered with occasional background noise
customer_reviews.text: Nice picture with properly adjusted settings. Fan is a bit loud from time to time... Auto iris is noisy so need to turn this function off. Overall, not too bad for the price..
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to mount, easy to set up. And the picture quality is outstanding - better than my eyes can detect. I use it on a 100 inch diagonal screen and could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Sherlock Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Loves it.
customer_reviews.text: You can read all the other reviews which are pretty spot on. Again, like some have said it is rather bright and I have a large room. Very clear picture and we still love it for the price and features.
customer_reviews.author: S. C. O'BLACK

customer_reviews.title: We love it!!
customer_reviews.text: The picture is very clear. Couldn't be happier with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: ... refurbished 3020 from Amazon and it's solid and a good projector for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the refurbished 3020 from Amazon and it's solid and a good projector for the price. You will not be blown away or disappointed. This is a better option than purchasing a used projector from CL for most likely a similar price.
customer_reviews.author: J&J

customer_reviews.title: It works perfectly and I couldn't be more satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a used one that noted in the description that it had minor blemishes on the sides and top of the projector, but what I received was a completely new and unused projector set to include the rechargeable 3D glasses. It works perfectly and I couldn't be more satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: David Luckett

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector for the price
customer_reviews.text: I would highly reccomend this projector to anyone who wants great picture quality. I am using this projector with Yamaha receiver and Samsung Blu Ray player and movie experience is just extraordinary. I have used 3D option as well and it is good. Would reccomend this to anyone who wants a solid movie theater experience.
customer_reviews.author: Puneet Shrivastava

customer_reviews.title: Great projector...
customer_reviews.text: Great projector.. Had one just like it but it took a surge hit and burned up. Glad we found another one.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Faz

customer_reviews.title: My first Projector for Cinema System and so far everything is OK
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector for my media room. I was scared to put it first time but as I wasnt sure what all setting I will have to do. Arrived on time. Work OK The screen size is bigger than what I was expecting, so very glad about that. Watched few movies and loving the picture quality
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Oliveros

customer_reviews.title: For the price great value!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, best resolution with blue ray and HD stations. DVD quality is so-so. Playstation play is amazing. I have medium quality equipment, paid less for entire package than I did for 55 inch smart tv three years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn Aust Jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Buy refurbished. Someone has checked it out for you so you know it works
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy cook

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome with Elite 120" screen! I couldn't be happier with this projector and definitely would recommend to anyone looking.
customer_reviews.author: drewp

customer_reviews.title: was very disappointed and sent it back after a week
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the refurbished product, was very disappointed and sent it back after a week. I was not able to get a sharp image although I tried to adjust the focus and image settings several times. After receiving the reimbursement I ordered benq HC1075 and am very pleased. The image is and sharp, the lamp is bright and the speakers are better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alon

customer_reviews.title: ... had this projector about a month and couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this projector about a month and couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Projector with best HD quality picture
customer_reviews.text: I am using this projector for last 18 months. We absolutely like the projector and its quality both in 2D and 3D. only on problem we encountered is all of suddenly it loses picture and takes long time to display "Epson" logo and goes into "two red lights flashing" mode. I called Empson warranty and they have sent me the replacement unit. But the other one also developed the same issue. I am using best (belkin) digital surge protectors and APC UPS for power protection Any help to find the rootcause to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Durga D.

customer_reviews.title: The projector is good to go as advertised √ Problem
customer_reviews.text: The projector is good to go as advertised √ Problem: 👀 It came with 2 active rechargable Epson 3D glasses and a few weeks ago I bought a 3D disc player from Amazon. Only 1 of the Epson 3D glasses would charge...😡. Now i have to get this bad set of glasses replaced...hopefully Epson or Amazon will step up and help on this. Not happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: MPP

customer_reviews.title: Be careful if you have a small room with short throw distance
customer_reviews.text: If you have a relatively small room like me, pls careful, this might not be the right product for you. My throw distance (front lamp to screen) is a bit short of 11 feet, and according to manufacture tech support hot line, I should be able get max 120 Inch diagonal when it projects. I bought it and it turn out to be 99 inch diagonal, about 20% less than their claim. this is way too big of a difference to be acceptable. I filed a return due to product not functioning as stated last week. still have not got a reply on how to return it. Crawford's Superstore is the seller.
customer_reviews.author: teammates

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: I like this projector a lot and it has excellent power to show on my screen even with a little ambient light during the day. I wish it came with more 3D glasses so I cant give it 5 stars. Otherwise its pretty sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Folonline

customer_reviews.title: everything i wanted in a projector.
customer_reviews.text: It has everything i wanted and its a really nice projector, I was thinking of getting a led tv but, glad i bought this instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Picture But Constant Rattling is Distracting
customer_reviews.text: First off, all the good things you've read about the picture quality are true. The picture is bright and beautifully accurate. The real rub with this projector comes from the rattling noise it generates as it adjusts for white balance. I read about it before I bought the projector, but I had no idea how obnoxious it truly would be. It's not always rattling, but any sort of motion or scene change can cause it. In quiet points in movies and shows it will drive you nuts, in loud action scenes you will still notice it. This isn't a quiet rattle. I "stepped up" to this from a 720P Mitsubishi HD1000 projector and I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy V

customer_reviews.title: It's great. The light is bright and the color is ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great. The light is bright and the color is excellent. So glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Anne F.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: doesn't come with original package! and it become too hot within a minute!
customer_reviews.author: rayhan

customer_reviews.title: Good device
customer_reviews.text: Initially I added a negative review but after tweaking some things, this projector delivers pretty well. The 3D isn't quite as bright as I'd like (the glasses cause it to dim) but It does work well. I still wish it had an optical sound port (I have a Bose system connected to my PS3 with optical and it does sound more crisp than plain old analog). Strait of of the box the image lacks color and is not sharp. Luckily the customization is very detailed. JKB
customer_reviews.author: jkbel2l6

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IT !! FALSE REVIEWS
customer_reviews.text: I read all the false reviews about this product and realized that not good for the money I spent. I have replaced this item within a week. The issue is: It makes lot of noise and you hear click click sounds while changing the channels and while watching the movie with low volume. I did see at my friends house who bought the same product and it is not a defect. It is working as designed to work. So my friends, please do not buy this product and look something else. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Radhika Patil
